author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
quote: The darker the night, the brighter the stars, the deeper the grief, the closer is God!

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
quote: Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: We can know only that we know nothing. And that is the highest degree of human wisdom.

author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
quote: Man is sometimes extraordinarily, passionately, in love with suffering.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: The simplest, most ordinary life, without the necessity of doing anything else, was the easiest and also the most proper for man.
